Class Iceepeecee

java.lang.Object
Iceepeecee
public class Iceepeecee extends Object
The Iceepeecee class represents an environment for managing islands, flights, and photographs. It allows users to add, delete, and interact with these elements within a graphical canvas.
Version:
23/03/23
Author:
Ana María Durán And Laura Natalia Rojas

      public Iceepeecee(int length, int width)
      Constructs an Iceepeecee object with the specified canvas dimensions.
      Parameters:
      length - The length of the canvas (must be positive).
      width - The width of the canvas (must be positive).

  • Method Details

    • addIsland

      public void addIsland(String color, int[][] vertexArray)
      Add an island to Iceepeecee. Do not repeat the color pls( •ㅅ•) ----- Valid colors are: "red", "green", "blue", "yellow", "purple", "cyan", "pink", "orange", "brown", "gray", "magenta", "white", "lightBlue", "lime", "gold", "teal", "violet", "coral", "lavender", "olive", "maroon", "turquoise", "navyBlue", "bistre", "burgundy", "crimson", "lightCyan", "cobalt", "fuchsia", "garnet", "lightGray", "darkGray", "indigo", "lightLilac", "lightLime", "lightMagenta", "lightBrown", "darkBrown", "lightOrange", "darkOrange", "lightGold", "darkGold", "silver", "lightPink", "darkPink", "darkTurquoise", "lightGreen", "darkGreen", "lightViolet", "darkViolet" ----
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the island.
      vertexArray - The vertices of the island.

    • getIsland

      public Island getIsland(String color)
      Get an island by its color.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the island to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Island object with the specified color, or null if not found.

    • islandLocation

      public int[][] islandLocation(String island)
      Get the location of an island by color.
      Parameters:
      island - The color of the island to query.
      Returns:
      An array of coordinates representing the location of the island, or null if not found.

    • addFlight

      public void addFlight(String color, int[] from, int[] to)
      Add a flight to Iceepeecee. Do not repeat the color pls( •ㅅ•) ----- Valid colors are: "red", "green", "blue", "yellow", "purple", "cyan", "pink", "orange", "brown", "gray", "magenta", "white", "lightBlue", "lime", "gold", "teal", "violet", "coral", "lavender", "olive", "maroon", "turquoise", "navyBlue", "bistre", "burgundy", "crimson", "lightCyan", "cobalt", "fuchsia", "garnet", "lightGray", "darkGray", "indigo", "lightLilac", "lightLime", "lightMagenta", "lightBrown", "darkBrown", "lightOrange", "darkOrange", "lightGold", "darkGold", "silver", "lightPink", "darkPink", "darkTurquoise", "lightGreen", "darkGreen", "lightViolet", "darkViolet" ----
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the flight.
      from - The starting coordinates [x1, y1, z1].
      to - The ending coordinates [x2, y2, z2].

    • photograph

      public void photograph(String flightColor, double theta)
      Capture a photograph from a specific flight at the given angle (theta).
      Parameters:
      flightColor - The color of the flight to capture a photograph from.
      theta - The angle (in radians) at which the photograph is taken.

    • photograph

      public void photograph(double theta)
      Capture photographs from all flights in Iceepeecee at the given angle (theta).
      Parameters:
      theta - The angle (in radians) at which the photographs are taken.

    • makeVisible

      public void makeVisible()
      Make all elements in Iceepeecee visible, including flights, islands, and photographs.

      Make all elements in Iceepeecee invisible, including flights, islands, and photographs.
